name: Power Bee (Minigame)
description:
You are playing Power Bee. The protector of the beeyard. A storm is coming and evil insects with it. Avoid the contact to the aggressors and put them to rout (Use UP and DOWN + the A-Button).

This minigame is made for the "Gambe Boy Competition 2021". I've decided to start this mini game, when I finished my contribution for the SNES-DEV Game Jam (maybe you´re interessted; game page link: https://torte00.itch.io/super-rambler) and had'nt much time left for this project.

I used "GB Studio 2.0.0 Beta 4", its templates and some of its music / sound samples to build this minigame. Thank you Chris Maltby for this great tool. 

I had fun using "GB Studio" and hope you´re enjouing the game.
